voyeuristic disorder: known comorbidities in voyeuristic disorder are largely based on research with males suspected of or convicted for acts involving the secret watching of unsuspecting nude or sexually active persons hence these comorbidities might not apply to all individuals with voyeuristic disorder conditions that occur comorbidly with voyeuristic disorder include hypersexuality and other paraphilic disorders particularly exhibitionistic disorder de pressive bipolar anxiety and substance use disorders attentiondeficithyperactivity disorder and conduct disorder and antisocial personality disorder are also frequent co morbid conditions
